name: Fighting Spirit
description:
Do you have what it takes to survive?

In this game, you play as skeletons or marines. You must work together and collect weapons to defeat the other team!

Game made by Kobe Barnes

Cover Image by: http://vsftv.com/site/fighting-spirit-test-injusti...

Download Instuctions:

Download

Extract

Disable your firewall (This will allow the game to acess the internet to find game servers)

Play!
